cakes.desc: A chocolate layered cake filled with chocolate, caramel and fondant cream.
cakes.name: Amandine [Romania]

cakes.desc: A cake featuring butter as one of the main ingredients.
cakes.name: Butter cake [UK]

cakes.desc: A dessert with a thin base made from crushed biscuits and a thicker top layer of soft cheese, eggs and sugar. It can be baked or unbaked (in which case it is refrigerated.) The bottom layer can also be made of shortcrust, and in European countries the top layer is made from curd or a creamy kind of cottage cheese.
cakes.name: Cheesecake [Greece]

cakes.desc: A rich cake with candied fruit and spices; many versions of the cake contain currants, sultanas, and glac√© cherries.
cakes.name: Fruitcake [Rome]
